explanation: [0-0] In a bright living room, a black-haired woman with a floral short-sleeved shirt and shorts is sitting barefoot on a gray sofa, looking at her phone. Above the floor in front of her is a pair of hands holding a pink basin. On the sofa, there's a large brown teddy bear, a pink pig plush toy, and a sleeping gray cat. Paintings are hung on the white wall behind the sofa, and a blue curtain is on the left side of the sofa.

[0-2] As the camera moves, a short-haired man in blue printed pajamas appears, squatting by the black-haired woman's feet with a pink basin filled with black liquid. He reaches out and lifts the woman's left foot.

[0-2] As the camera moves, a short-haired man in blue printed pajamas appears, squatting by the black-haired woman's feet with a pink basin filled with black liquid. He reaches out and lifts the woman's left foot.

[2-4] The black-haired woman pulls back her left foot and stands up. She pours the black liquid from the pink basin onto the living room's tile floor and throws the basin at the short-haired man, who is curled up on the floor with his head in his hands. The cat sleeping on the sofa looks up at them. Immediately, the scene changes, and the black-haired woman is leaning on the sofa, looking at her phone with her legs crossed. A pair of purple slippers is placed on the tile floor next to the sofa. At this moment, the short-haired man with a blue folding basin in his hand appears on the right side of the screen. He places the basin on the floor, and both of them look down at it.

He places the basin on the floor, and both of them look down at it.

[4-8] The camera moves, and a pair of hands unfolds the blue folding basin. A dark blue basin filled with hot water appears on the left, pouring the water into the folding basin. The shot changes again, showing a hand holding a glass above the folding basin, pouring garlic cloves, chilies, and green leaves into it. Then, the woman in printed shorts is seen sitting on the sofa, soaking her feet in the blue folding basin. The camera focuses on the basin and her legs.

[8-11] The shot changes to show a pair of legs submerged in the blue folding basin filled with foot bath water, rubbing the tops of the feet together. As the camera switches, the water in the basin disappears, and the two feet fold the basin down before a hand picks it up. The scene then shifts to the hand hanging the blue folding basin on a hook next to the bathroom sink. A small pot of green plants sits on the sink counter, while a pot of sunflowers is placed on the floor below the basin.
